title: Train fault causing delays on the North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services are now operating normally. Free bus service has ceased.
[NSL] Train service has resumed. Trains are travelling at a slower speed due to an earlier train fault. Free bus service is still available.
[NSL] Estimate 25 mins additional travelling time from Marina Bay to Ang Mo Kio due to train fault at Braddell station.
